attributes.action: Taxi Trade against extortionate reserves added to insurance policies
attributes.background: To stop insurance companies from putting massive reserves against taxi companies and drivers when the accidents are not our faults

rejection.details:
The identification of risk and resulting pricing and structure of insurance premiums is a matter for individual insurers, not the UK Government or Parliament. 

If you wish to complain about a particular insurance company, you can do so through the Financial Ombudsman Service. You can find out more about how to do this here: https://www.financial-ombudsman.org.uk/consumers/complaints-can-help/insurance and here: https://www.financial-ombudsman.org.uk/businesses/complaints-deal/insurance.
